Bundles > General

All skysail bundles share the same layout:

src/main/java

src/main/resource

src/test/java

src/test/resource

osgi.bnd

pom.xml

skysail bundles are build using maven 3 ; everything maven needs to know about the project is defined in this file. To install the projects, simply type "mvn clean install".
